name: Coom Battles Online [prototype]
description:
-------------------------------------- The Best Multiplayer Game you ever seen!

Play as weird pink thing and kill your friends in the most entertaining game ever!

(pls do not play this crap)

Server Setup Instructions

1 - open .exe server file

2 - go to your router settings and forward port -  for example 6969 (haha funny number)

3 - start server on ip address 0.0.0.0 and on port that you just forwarded, dont forgot to set max. amount of players

4 - then your friends just connect on that port you forwarded and on your public ip add. 

/!\ WARNING - forwarding port means, anyone with your public ip address can possibly hack you, so play only with people you trust. Iam not responsible for any damage made on your PC /!\
